creator: TYMIT
descriptionHtml:
Tymit is the first instalment credit card, giving you complete control and transparency over your spending from the minute you plan to make a purchase through to making the repayment.

Say goodbye to the minimum payment trap, confusing interest charges and hidden fees. Spread the cost of any purchase across up to 3 months at 0% APR. Tymit is the credit card, reinvented.

We have re-designed the credit card, to put you in control.

- Affordable repayments, at your fingertips. Select your instalment plan of between 3 – 24 months from within the app, the moment you make the purchase. Purchases repaid at the end of the month or put into 3 instalments are interest free (0% APR).

- Complete flexibility to adjust your repayment schedule at any time, with no penalties or fees.

- When deciding whether to commit to that family holiday or the latest smart phone, use our purchase simulator to plan how it will impact your monthly bills.

- Bundle up! Is our unique way to monitor your spending, by grouping similar purchases together. You can customise the appearance and apply a re-payment plan of your choice.

- Protect your credit history, by staying on track to repay your balance. The app will give you complete visibility on your future payments and deliver smart alerts, so you never miss a payment.

- Save money when you travel, with no fees on spending abroad and no fees from Tymit on cash advances abroad up to £200 a month.

- Absolutely no fees for membership, international transactions, going over your limit and cash advances.

Credit limits from £500 to £15,000 and interest rates varying from 12% - 22.7%, subject to eligibility, terms and conditions apply.

Tymit LTD is a company registered in England and Wales (No. 10827757), authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) under firm reference number 796994 and is also registered with the Payment Services Regulator (PSR) for providing payment services. Postal address 5 Merchant Square, London, W2 1AY.

The Card is issued by Wirecard Card Solutions Ltd (“WDCS”) pursuant to licence from Visa. WDCS is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority to conduct electronic money service activities under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (Ref: 900051).

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
It’s been a tough few weeks, but we hope everyone has been staying safe and keeping positive!

To brighten your day we have a new update for the app, which includes the following exciting developments:

- The referral program now has it’s own screen & better still you can now earn £15 for every referral!
- There are a few minor design updates.
- As if that wasn’t enough we’ve also squashed some of those annoying bugs, enjoy!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We’ve been working hard to improve the app and this update includes the following exciting updates:

- The design of the payment plan screen has been improved, making it even easier for you to spread the cost of your purchases. Don’t forget payment plans of 3 months are interest free!

- You can now access FAQ’s via the app so you can quickly see answers to common queries.

- We’ve improved in app chat so that conversations remain visible, even if you close the app.

- Google Pay integration for payments without physical card. Contactless payments can exceed the £45 limit.

- Complete flexibility to adjust and manage online your repayment schedule at any time, with no penalties or fees.

- Use our purchase simulator to check how it will impact your monthly repayments.

- Bundle up! Is our unique way to monitor your spending, by grouping similar purchases together. You can customise the appearance and apply a re-payment plan of your choice.

- Protect your credit history, by staying on track to repay your balance. The app will allow you to view your future payments and deliver smart alerts, so you never miss a payment.

- Save money when you travel, with no fees on spending abroad and no fees from Tymit on cash advances abroad up to £200 a month.

- Absolutely no fees for membership, international transactions, going over your limit and cash advances.

Download the app now and easily register. Then use our secure log-in to manage your account.

title: Tymit Credit Card

creator: TYMIT
descriptionHtml:
Tymit is the first instalment credit card, giving you complete control and transparency over your spending from the minute you plan to make a purchase through to making the repayment.



Say goodbye to the minimum payment trap, confusing interest charges and hidden fees. Spread the cost of any purchase across up to 3 months at 0% APR. Tymit is the credit card, reinvented.



We have re-designed the credit card, to put you in control.

- Affordable repayments, at your fingertips. Spread the cost of any purchase across 3 months interest-free. If you need longer, you can choose 6, 12, 24 and 36 months (interest is payable on plans of 6 months or more). You’ll always know how much interest you’ll pay up front. So you’re always in control of what you pay, and the number of instalments.

- Complete flexibility to adjust your repayment schedule at any time.

- When deciding whether to commit to that family holiday or the latest smart phone, use our purchase simulator to plan how it will impact your monthly bills.

- Bundle up! A unique way for you to monitor your spending, by grouping similar purchases together. You can customise the appearance and apply a re-payment plan of your choice.

- Protect your credit history, by staying on track to repay your balance. The app will give you complete visibility on your future payments and deliver smart alerts to help you to never miss a payment.

- Save money when you travel, with no fees on spending abroad.

- Absolutely no fees for membership and international transactions.

Credit limits from £500 to £5,000 and interest rates varying from 29.9% - 39.9%, subject to eligibility, terms and conditions apply.



Tymit LTD is a company registered in England and Wales (No. 10827757), authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) under firm reference number 796994 and is also registered with the Payment Services Regulator (PSR) for providing payment services. Postal address 5 Merchant Square, London, W2 1AY.

title: Tymit Credit Card

creator: TYMIT LTD
descriptionHtml:
Tymit is the first instalment credit card, giving you complete control and transparency over your spending from the minute you plan to make a purchase through to making the repayment.



Say goodbye to the minimum payment trap, confusing interest charges and hidden fees. Spread the cost of any purchase across up to 3 months at 0% APR. Tymit is the credit card, reinvented.



We have re-designed the credit card, to put you in control.

- Affordable repayments, at your fingertips. Spread the cost of any purchase across 3 months interest-free. If you need longer, you can choose 6, 12, 24 and 36 months (interest is payable on plans of 6 months or more). You’ll always know how much interest you’ll pay up front. So you’re always in control of what you pay, and the number of instalments.

- Complete flexibility to adjust your repayment schedule at any time.

- When deciding whether to commit to that family holiday or the latest smart phone, use our purchase simulator to plan how it will impact your monthly bills.

- Bundle up! A unique way for you to monitor your spending, by grouping similar purchases together. You can customise the appearance and apply a re-payment plan of your choice.

- Protect your credit history, by staying on track to repay your balance. The app will give you complete visibility on your future payments and deliver smart alerts to help you to never miss a payment.

- Save money when you travel, with no fees on spending abroad.

- Absolutely no fees for membership and international transactions.

Credit limits from £500 to £5,000 and interest rates varying from 29.9% - 39.9%, subject to eligibility, terms and conditions apply.

creator: TYMIT LTD
descriptionHtml:
Tymit is the first instalment credit card, giving you complete control over your spending. Tymit is the credit card, reinvented:

- Affordable repayments. Choose your instalment plan of between 3 – 24 months from within the app, the moment you make the purchase. Purchases are repaid at the end of the month or put into 3 instalments are interest free (0% APR).

- Google Pay integration for payments without physical card. Contactless payments can exceed the £45 limit.

- Complete flexibility to adjust and manage online your repayment schedule at any time, with no penalties or fees.

- Use our purchase simulator to check how it will impact your monthly repayments.

- Bundle up! Is our unique way to monitor your spending, by grouping similar purchases together. You can customise the appearance and apply a re-payment plan of your choice.

- Protect your credit history, by staying on track to repay your balance. The app will allow you to view your future payments and deliver smart alerts, so you never miss a payment.

- Save money when you travel, with no fees on spending abroad and no fees from Tymit on cash advances abroad up to £200 a month.

- Absolutely no fees for membership, international transactions, going over your limit and cash advances.

Credit limit from £500 to £15,000 and interest rates varying from 12% - 22.7%, subject to eligibility, terms and conditions apply.

Download the app now and easily register. Then use our secure log-in to manage your account.
